title: BRIEF-Retail Food Group Sees FY20 Underlying EBITDA In Range Of $42-$46 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Retail Food Group Sees FY20 Underlying EBITDA In Range Of $42-$46 Mln

Stock Markets 49 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 12:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Retail Food Group Sees FY20 Underlying EBITDA In Range Of $42-$46 Mln Oct 11 (Reuters) - Retail Food Group Ltd : * FY20 UNDERLYING EBITDA GUIDANCE IN RANGE OF $42.0 - $46.0 MILLION * ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF $150 MILLION INSTITUTIONAL PLACEMENT AND A SHARE PURCHASE PLAN OF $10 MILLION * NET PROCEEDS OF PLACEMENT AND SPP WILL PRIMARILY BE USED TO PAY DOWN DEBT AND PROVIDE WORKING CAPITAL * INTENDS TO OFFER A SHARE PURCHASE PLAN AT $0.10 PER SHARE, SAME PRICE AS PLACEMENT

BRIEF-Retail Food Group Sees FY20 Underlying EBITDA In Range Of $42-$46 Mln
description: BRIEF-Retail Food Group Sees FY20 Underlying EBITDA In Range Of $42-$46 Mln
